sources.title: The Green Hornet (1940) 13-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
13-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Kent Taylor, Ralph Morgan, Irene Hervey, Robert Armstrong
Directed by: Ford Beebe & Ray Taylor

Britt Reid, the new publisher of The Sentinel newspaper, secretly becomes the vigilante crime fighter The Green Hornet. Backing him up is his fearless valet and inventor, Kato. Reid's father, Dan, was the Lone Ranger's nephew in the original radio series, making the Green Hornet the great-nephew of the Ranger.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
01:04     CHAPTER 1: The Tunnel of Terror
22:22     CHAPTER 2: The Thundering Terror
43:05     CHAPTER 3: Flying Coffins
1:04:43  CHAPTER 4: Pillar of Flame
1:24:05  CHAPTER 5: The Time Bomb
1:44:19  CHAPTER 6: Highways of Peril
2:05:54  CHAPTER 7: Bridge of Disaster
2:27:10  CHAPTER 8: Dead or alive
2:45:21  CHAPTER 9: The Hornet Trapped
3:05:18  CHAPTER 10: Bullets and Ballots
3:22:58  CHAPTER 11: Disaster Rides the Rails
3:41:54  CHAPTER 12: Panic in the Zoo
4:02:44  CHAPTER 13: Doom of the Underworld
4:22:48  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Faced with rising crime and increased racketeering activity, intrepid newspaper editor Britt Reid becomes the crime fighter the Green Hornet. Donning a disguise, the Hornet and his brilliant Korean inventor/sidekick Kato fight an infamous racket that's menacing their city.
metadata.Writer: George H. Plympton, Basil Dickey, Morrison Wood
metadata.Actors: Gordon Jones, Wade Boteler, Keye Luke
